Another form of life, another chance at adventure. Not your typical aliens invaded story. Chrisis is an understatement . Continuing the saga of the most horrible things that can happen in war when the aliens have been winning. How is it really possible for the aliens to achieve their goals? Impossible is not a word that exists in this case. War and love in a far distant future. Witches and horrible pirates are possible in this series,not to mention the possibilities of dragons. Survival is the most important thing to achieve in this story. The world of the future will be amazing and very different. So you were wondering about the king and the enemy. Lots of fun for the most unlikely and juvenile heroes and deadly serious problems with pirates. Many new revelations about everything involved in the Dragon Blood stories. Excellent story with many extremely unexpected twists. Answers from the author of this series is in the story and the surprise twists continue. A CONTINUATION OF THE  STORY OF AMII. Continuing the saga of AMII to the END? War is hell and the most horrible things continue to happen. Excellent continuation of this series! Conquest of Earth was a tossup as to who or what would win. Continuing the most horrible and deadly serious problems with many extremely unexpected twists. Another excellent example of the possibilities for power and adventure in the future. Aliens and humans are possibly going through an extremely unexpected battle. Strange and deadly enemies abound in the future.
